display.title: Let The Stars Guide You
display.description: Starfell is semi-difficult, medieval, RPG pack. This pack is fairly slow paced and quite integrated. You'll need to choose between 9 classes, those being: Rogue, Warrior, Warlock, Paladin, Priest, Frozen Champion, Vampire, Blightbringer, or Archer. Each of these has their own perks and spells. These quests will guide you through progression. The journey is here, make it yours!
